messages.message:
Hey all, I was talking to multiple people this week about crafting docs. I think weâ€™re due for some consolidation and re-organization of the docs. Apologies while we try to get that together.

I was also thinking about Sean and I doing a workshop, where everyone on the call can set up a crafting sandbox and then we can go through some exercises together. If you think that will be helpful, give this message a thumbs up so I can judge the interest.
Do we have any stats on how many people are already using crafting? Then potentially we can skip the creating the sandbox part
